data.text: @jyduclos @GovCanHealth When will we be able to receive injections of this new vaccine here in New Brunswick and what will be the process for that?

@jyduclos You cannot win the fight against covid, yes, you will lose every step of the way.  Covid will continue for a long time.  Vaccination will never defeat covid.  It is better for you to give up and surrender to God. Vaccination will never going to help anyone period.

@jyduclos @GovCanHealth Great news!  Will this vaccine work at the border?  You have always not trusted the other very effective vaccines at the border for some reason. @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @JustinTrudeau @Irek_K @manvirshokar @CPHO_Canada
